Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
The research of Fogmeta Labs spans multiple levels from system technology, infrastructure, and middleware to services and solutions, and involves future systems, network technology and business, distributed systems and management, information management, and interactive and innovative services. Based on the views on and practices in the industry, Fogmeta also solves the problem of business complexity through operations optimization and other technologies.

Meta Ark is a data onboarding service provided by Fogmeta Labs for helping clients store their corporate datasets onto IPFS/Filecoin. Please refer to: https://fogmetalabs.com/metaark.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: These are private corporate datasets owned by our Meta Ark clients. Meta Ark is a data onboarding service provided by Fogmeta Labs for helping clients store their corporate datasets onto IPFS/Filecoin. Please refer to: https://fogmetalabs.com/metaark.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We're going to use the `go-mc-sdk` to prepare the datasets. https://github.com/FogMeta/go-mc-sdk
